title: Was Trey Gowdy’s Son Found Dead in a Dumpster?
subtitle: The latest in an ongoing series of hoaxes targeting Rep. Trey Gowdy involved a false claim his son was found dead in a Washington, D.C. dumpster.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Rep. Trey Gowdy's son was found dead in a Washington, D.C. dumpster.
